seo.title: Positano to Ravello by Bus | Hostel Brikette
seo.description: Step-by-step from Positano to Ravello via Amalfi on SITA buses, with ticket tips, timetable guidance, Chiesa Nuova stop details, and transfer advice.

intro.title: Positano to Ravello – via Amalfi by Bus
intro.body: Travel from Positano to Ravello with a simple change in Amalfi. This guide covers where to buy SITA tickets, how to read the timetable, and what to expect when changing in Amalfi — plus how to reach the Positano bus stop from Hostel Brikette.
